Tests the signed exchange information are available when the prefetch failed.

* http://127.0.0.1:8000/loading/htxg/resources/htxg-location.htxg
  failed: true
  statusCode: 200
  resourceType: other
* http://localhost:8000/loading/htxg/resources/127.0.0.1.pem.msg
  failed: false
  statusCode: 200
  resourceType: other
